item.title: Determinism
item.description:
Are you the author or the narrator of your thoughts? It’s an obvious one you think as you respond to that question in your mind. But why are you thinking about if you’re the author or narrator at all? Without the prompting of the opening question, would that be something you would be thinking about today?

When having a conversation, how much of what you say is pre-planned and pre-written in your mind, and how much just… comes out. I’d imagine it’s quite heavily in favour of the latter, even if you have pre-arranged ideas of what you’d like to talk about.
